item.title: Getting data from binary Excel (xlsb) files on a Windows machine
item.description: This is a fairly simple macro written in VBScript which saves all worksheets in all workbooks in the same directory as the script. Dim xl Dim fso Dim dir Dim f Dim wb Dim sh Set xl = CreateObject("Excel.Application") Set fso = CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject") dir = fso.GetAbsolutePathName(".") With xl .Visible = False .DisplayAlerts = False .AskToUpdateLinks = False .AlertBeforeOverwriting = False .ScreenUpdating = False End With For Each f in fso.GetFolder(dir).Files If LCase(fso.
